document_data.mainbody: '''''Dungeon'' issue 28''' was released in March/April of 1991. It contained the following articles related to the [[Forgotten Realms]]:

Index.Characters: :[[Barnabas (half-orc)|Barnabas]] • [[Calahar Twohands]] • [[Chloris]] • [[Dammek]] • [[Dammon (human)|Dammon]] • [[Geildarr Ithym]] • [[George (gorgon)|George]] • [[Grintharke]] • [[Harazos Thelbrim]] • [[Lilliana]] • [[Nanathlor Greysword]] • [[Pomerian]] • [[Slag (fire giant)|Slag]] • [[Traskar Selarn]]
